page.title: 06GENERAL FARMING
page.content: THERE ARE 18 FARM HOLDINGS SHOWN ON THE MAP, ALTHOUGH MANY ARE NOW JOINTLY OWNED. THE FARMS ARE MOSTLY{ARABLE}BUT SOME HAVE LIVESTOCK, AND MARKET GARDENING IS COMMON ON THE SANDIER SOIL. OVER 80% OF THE AREA IS TAKEN UP BY FARMLAND. HERE IS A LIST OF FARM PRODUCTS TO SHOW THE VARIETY IN THE AREA. {ARABLE CROPS:}WHEAT, BARLEY, RAPE, PEAS, POTATOES, RYE, SUGAR BEET, TURNIPS, FIELD BEANS AND GRASS FOR SILAGE AND HAY. {MARKET GARDENING CROPS:}STRAWBERRIES, RASPBERRIES, BLACKCURRANTS, REDCURRANTS, GREEN BEANS, BROAD BEANS, ONIONS, GOOSEBERRIES, APPLES, PEARS, PLUMS, CHERRIES, AND LETTUCE. {LIVESTOCK:}CATTLE (DAIRY AND BEEF), SHEEP, PIGS, POULTRY (CHICKENS, DUCKS, GEESE).BEES ARE ALSO KEPT.
